title: RealBASIC 2008 r4.2 Professional + SN
description:
This is RealBASIC 2008 r4.2 Professional.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Have you noticed how scene releases all contain some diss to P2P somewhere in the .nfo?  They&#039;re pissed because their releases get "stolen" (lol) and put onto p2p networks. They&#039;re pissed because they&#039;re getting more exposure than they want.

And then they stole my last RealBASIC release and pushed it as their own. 

You think it&#039;s the movie/software/record industry lapdogs who keep posting fake torrents and comments that say "VIRUS!!!!1oneoneoneoomg"? Well, it probably is. But the sceners do it too.

Fuck TRiNiTY.
Fuck the scene.
